GENBLUE

Introduction

XXIN is a Taiwanese singer affiliated with TEN Entertainment. She gained recognition as a contestant on the reality survival shows Youth With You 2, and NEXT GIRLZ. She is currently a member of the Taiwanese girl group GENBLUE.
